path /v3/bitcoin/transaction
opid btctransferblockchain
params None
sum send btc to bitcoin addresses
reqBody
oneof
type object
required
to
fromaddress
props
fromaddress
desc the array of blockchain addresses to send the assets from and their private keys for each address the last 100 transactions are scanned for any utxo to be included in the transaction
type array
items
type object
required
address
privatekey
props
address
desc the blockchain address to send the assets from
type string
minimum 30
maximum 50
privatekey
desc the private key of the address to send the assets from
type string
minimum 52
maximum 52
schName btctransactionfromaddresssource
to
desc the array of blockchain addresses to send the assets to and the amounts that each address should receive in btc the difference between the utxos calculated in the fromaddress section and the total amount to receive calculated in the to section will be used as the gas fee to explicitly specify the fee amount and the blockchain address where any extra funds remaining after covering the fee will be sent set the fee and changeaddress parameters
type array
items
type object
required
address
value
props
address
desc the blockchain address to receive the assets
type string
minimum 30
maximum 60
value
desc the amount to receive in btc
type number
minimum 0
schName btctransactionfromaddresstarget
fee
type string
desc the fee to be paid for the transaction in btc if you are using this parameter you have to also use the changeaddress parameter because these two parameters only work together
changeaddress
desc the blockchain address to send any extra assets remaning after covering the fee to if you are using this parameter you have to also use the fee parameter because these two parameters only work together
type string
minimum 30
maximum 60

path /v3/bitcoin/broadcast

params None
sum broadcast a signed bitcoin transaction
reqBody
schema broadcastkms
props
txdata
desc raw signed transaction to be published to network
maxlength 500000
minlength 1
type string
signatureid
desc id of prepared payment template to sign required only when broadcasting transaction signed by tatum kms
format uuid
type string
index

type number
minimum 0
maximum 2147483647
required
txdata
type object
